item.description: Donald Trump’s political advisers don’t want to talk about abortion, but pro-lifers need to speak up.

item.title: AmericaFest honors Target employee Jeanie Beeman after viral video shows calm response to harassment
item.description: Target employee Jeanie Beeman was honored at AmericaFest after going viral for calmly handling a confrontation over her Charlie Kirk T-shirt at work.

item.title: Sen. Rand Paul does not want Vice President J.D. Vance to be the next president
item.description: Sen. Rand Paul said Sunday that he's not on board with efforts to name Vice President J.D. Vance as the heir apparent to President Trump.

item.title: Vance says 'America First' movement rejects 'purity tests,' welcomes critical thinkers
item.description: JD Vance tells AmericaFest that president Trump built the greatest coalition by rejecting purity tests and welcoming freethinkers to America First.

item.title: White House teases major housing affordability plan as prices squeeze Americans

item.title: America’s Risky Retreat in Biomedical Leadership
